name: Daughters of the Dancing Flame
description:
This game was made for the 32bit Jam 2022 Hosted by Team Potato and ROOK RULES: Straight Forward Gaming. The theme is “Another World” or “The Ocean”. Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Move Mouse - Look Around 
  • Left Click - Attack / Second Attack 
  • Shift or E - Target
  • Spacebar - Dash 
  • Esc - Pause
    • Objective:

    Your rule to the empire is coming to an end; your flame is dying out. Perform in a celebration of combat to honor your reign as The Queen of The Dancing Flame. How long can you withstand?

    Survive for as long as you can in the arena while your health slowly decreases overtime. Touch the braziers and strike down your adversaries in order to keep your health up.

    Contributions:
    • tiago-a-ribeiro (Coding, 3D-Modelling, Game Design)
    • noirova (Sound Design, Concept Art)
    • terrestrial-hybrid (a good friend, Texture/Concept art)
    • stephen-berry (Music)
